page.title: 06Barkestone and the law
page.content: People are not supposed to ride a bike with a dog on a lead.People have to have a licence to have a dog it costs 37p.People must be 17 to drive a car. People must be 16 to drive a moped. People must have a seat belt on in the front seats.All vehicles must be insured before going on the road. People must not kill a whale or a swan or badgers or else you have broken the law and may be fined.People must not leave a child under six on their own in a room with an open fire.People must not smoke under the age of 16.You must not drink and drive or you could lose your driving licence for one year.Do not blow your horn after 11pm. It is againstthe law to murder some body and you may be imprisoned for a life sentence which is about 25 years if you behave in prison.
